common.privacyNotice: Your API key and data are stored locally in your browser to ensure privacy. If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us via the community or feedback page.
common.dragAndDropText: Click or drag file here to upload
common.noTargetLanguage: Select at least one target language
common.singleFileModeTooltip: Keep only one file; new uploads replace the current file
common.bigNotice: For large files (>1MB), enable 'Large File Mode' to prevent lag.
common.largeModeTooltip: Hide input preview to improve performance for large files
common.hideResultsTooltip: Hide result preview to prevent page lag from large content
common.directExportTooltip: Automatically download after processing, skipping result preview
common.useCacheTooltip: Reuse previous translation cache to speed up processing
common.contextAwareTranslationTooltip: Translate with context for better coherence and accuracy (AI models only)
common.multiLanguageModeTooltip: Translate to multiple languages simultaneously, saved as separate files
common.resetUploadTooltip: Clear current input and uploaded files
common.sameLanguageTarget: Source and target languages are the same; automatically adjusted target to
common.sameLanguageSource: Source and target languages are the same; automatically adjusted source to
common.enterApiKey: Enter API Key or switch to Free API
common.enterLlmUrl: Please configure LLM URL in 'API Settings'
common.deepLXUnavailable: DeepLX node unavailable, automatically switched to GTX API (Free)
common.deeplUnavailable: DeepL node unavailable, please check configuration in 'API Settings'
common.llmUnavailable: LLM node unavailable, please check configuration in 'API Settings'
common.noFileUploaded: Please upload a file to process first
common.noSourceText: Please enter or paste text content
common.removeCharsAfterTranslationTooltip: Automatically remove specified characters after translation (separate multiple with spaces)
common.multiLangSettingsHint: Enter language codes, separated by comma or space.
common.retryCountTooltip: Number of retry attempts when translation fails
common.retryTimeoutTooltip: Maximum wait time per translation request

json.title: JSON Translator | i18n Localization with JSONPath Support
json.description: Struggling with JSON translation? Use our AI-powered tool with JSONPath matching & key mapping. Perfect for i18n. Supports DeepSeek/Google. Free & open source!
json.clientDescription: JSON translation tool for developers. Supports JSONPath matching and key mapping for fast project internationalization.
json.i18nModeExtra: i18n mode uses source language as base (auto defaults to en) and merges all target language translations into the same object.
json.inputOutputKeyMissing: Input and output keys cannot be empty
json.nodeCountMismatch: Node count mismatch: input and output keys have different node counts
json.keyToTranslateExtra: Specify the key name to translate
json.StartKeyExtra: (Optional) Specify start position, leave empty to start from beginning
json.fieldToTranslateExtra: Specify field name to translate (single only)
json.nodeToTranslateExtra: When using node name, matches only first-level children
json.keyMappingTooltip: Toggle Mode: Original Key (A→A) vs Mapping (A→B)

markdown.title: Markdown Translator | Preserve Format & Code for Docs
markdown.description: Need to translate docs? MDTranslator keeps formatting, code blocks & LaTeX intact. Supports DeepSeek & AI models. Batch translate your knowledge base now!
markdown.clientDescription: Upload Markdown files or paste text. Intelligently preserves format, code, and formulas. One-click translate to multiple languages.
markdown.tLatexTooltip: Translate LaTeX formulas (avoid if currency symbols etc. are misidentified)
markdown.rawTranslationModeTooltip: Skip Markdown parsing; output doesn't need to strictly preserve original formatting

subtitle.title: Subtitle Translator | Free Online SRT/ASS/VTT Batch Tool
subtitle.description: Translating videos? Batch translate SRT/ASS subtitles with AI. Auto-timeline sync & bilingual support. Integrates DeepSeek & Google. Accurate & fast. Try free!
subtitle.clientDescription: Upload subtitles or paste content. Select target language for fast translation. Supports batch processing and retains timelines.
subtitle.bilingualTooltip: Generate bilingual subtitles with original and translated text
subtitle.unsupportedSub: Unrecognized format. Please ensure file is SRT, ASS, VTT, or LRC.
subtitle.noFileUploaded: Please upload a subtitle file first
subtitle.noSourceText: Please upload subtitle file or paste text
subtitle.noExtractedText: No subtitle content extracted, please check file format
subtitle.bilingualError: Complex style tags detected. Bilingual mode may cause formatting issues. Recommended to disable 'Bilingual Subtitles'.

TranslationSettings.deeplxUrlExtra: Optional, leave empty for default node
TranslationSettings.modelExtra: LLM Model Name, check API docs for available models
TranslationSettings.temperatureExtra: Temperature (0-2): Higher is more random, lower is more deterministic. Recommended: 0.2-0.8
TranslationSettings.systemPromptExtra: System prompt for LLM translation, leave empty for default
TranslationSettings.userPromptExtra: Custom translation prompt, leave empty for default. Variables:
TranslationSettings.chunkSizeExtra: Multi-line text (Subtitles, Markdown) will be split by this size
TranslationSettings.batchSizeExtra: Max lines to translate simultaneously. Too high may cause API rate limiting or empty responses.
TranslationSettings.contextWindowExtra: Lines per batch for context-aware translation. Higher values provide better context but may exceed model token limits.
TranslationSettings.useRelayTooltip: Enable API relay for DeepSeek if you encounter CORS or 403 errors

text-splitter.title: Text Splitter | Smart Segmenter for AI & Social Media
text-splitter.description: Text too long for AI? Smartly split content by chars or sentences for ChatGPT & social media. Auto-detect paragraphs, merge results & export. Fix limits now!
text-splitter.clientDescription: Smartly split long text by character count or sentence. Perfect for AI input, social media, and editing. For non-UTF-8 text (e.g., some French files), upload file directly for auto-encoding detection.
text-splitter.noExportableText: No exportable content detected, please check input
text-splitter.setExportFileName: Custom export filename (leave empty for default)
text-splitter.emptyForSymbolOnly: Leave empty to split by symbol only
text-splitter.splitByChineseParagraphTooltip: Smart split based on Chinese paragraph rules (newlines)
text-splitter.splitByEnglishParagraphTooltip: Smart split based on English sentence algorithms
text-splitter.checkDownloadDirectory: All split files exported, check download directory

img-prompt.title: IMGPrompt Generator | Batch Create JSON Datasets
img-prompt.description: Need IMGPrompt data? Batch convert & deduplicate to standard JSON. Customize fields, validate formats & export. Simplify dataset creation for AI training now!
img-prompt.clientDescription: Batch generate JSON data for IMGPrompt. Input name pairs per line (e.g., Illustration:插图), separated by tab '\t' or colon ':'. Example: 'Illustration: 插图' or 'sketch: 素描'. You can also customize object and attribute values.

flare.title: Flare Converter | Browser to Flare Bookmarks with Hierarchy
flare.description: Switching to Flare? Convert browser bookmarks to Flare format instantly. Bi-directional support for App/Bookmark modes. Preserve folder hierarchy & tags. Try it!
flare.clientDescription: Convert bookmarks to Flare format. Supports bidirectional conversion between Flare App and Bookmark modes, preserving hierarchy.

json-match-update.title: JSON Match Update | Batch Backfill & Sync Field Values
json-match-update.description: Need to merge JSON data? Match datasets by key & batch update target fields. Supports data tracing & missing value alerts. Perfect for syncing & cleaning data.
json-match-update.clientDescription: Match two JSON datasets by specified fields and update target values. Example: Match source 'id' with target 'card_id' to update 'weight' from 'count'.

json-node-edit.title: JSON Batch Editor | Smart Find, Replace & Prefix Tool
json-node-edit.description: Editing massive JSON? Batch add prefix/suffix, find & replace, or overwrite values. Supports nested keys & real-time preview. Standardize your data instantly!
json-node-edit.clientDescription: Batch find and edit JSON values. Add prefix/suffix, replace text. Supports multiple nodes (comma-separated, e.g., 'object,attribute') and nested keys (e.g., 'zh.title').
json-node-edit.capitalizeFirstLetterDescription: Automatically capitalize the first letter of node values
json-node-edit.multiLangReplaceDescription: Replace language codes (zh, en, ja) with language names (e.g., en → English)

json-node-inserter.title: JSON Node Inserter | Batch Add Fields & Preserve Order
json-node-inserter.description: Missing fields in JSON? Batch insert new nodes at specific positions while keeping hierarchy & order. Supports array handling. Expand your data structure now!
json-node-inserter.clientDescription: Batch insert new nodes after specified node. Supports multiple nodes (comma-separated).

json-sort-classify.title: JSON Sort & Classify | numeric Sort & Multi-field Grouping
json-sort-classify.description: Messy JSON arrays? Sort by custom order, numeric values, or group by multiple fields. Generate structured reports for analysis. Organize your data effortlessly!
json-sort-classify.clientDescription: Sort or group JSON arrays. Supports custom order, numeric sort, and multi-field grouping. Example: 1. Sort: Enter order in 'Sort Order', field in 'Sort Field', click 'Sort JSON'. 2. Classify: Enter 'Main Key' (grouping) and 'Sub Key' (sorting), click 'Classify & Sort'.
json-sort-classify.sortOrderTooltip: One value per line. Unlisted values follow default order.
json-sort-classify.mainsubKeyMissing: Main and Sub keys cannot be empty
json-sort-classify.sortCustomMissing: Sort Order cannot be empty for Custom Sort

json-value-extractor.title: JSON Value Extractor | Batch Extract Fields with JSONPath
json-value-extractor.description: Extracting data? Batch pull values using JSONPath or nested keys. Add prefix/suffix & deduplicate automatically. Create training data or keyword lists fast!
json-value-extractor.clientDescription: Extract JSON values by field name. Supports prefix/suffix and batch processing.
json-value-extractor.noNodeToExtract: Add at least one extraction field
json-value-extractor.nodeToExtractTooptip: Field name or path to extract

json-value-swapper.title: JSON Value Swapper | Quick Field Swap & Data Correction
json-value-swapper.description: Wrong field values? One-click swap two fields in a JSON array. Auto-handles all items & checks for missing keys. Fix data errors without manual editing!
json-value-swapper.clientDescription: Swap values of two fields in a JSON array. Note: Supports first-level keys only, not nested keys.

json-value-transformer.title: JSON Value Mapper | Migrate Fields with JSONPath Rules
json-value-transformer.description: Migrating JSON fields? Map values using JSONPath & custom rules. Supports conditional mapping & batch replacement. Ensure data integrity during transformation!
json-value-transformer.clientDescription: Map values from one field to another. Supports JSONPath and batch processing.

subtitleTranslator.title: Subtitle Translator
subtitleTranslator.description: Batch translate SRT, ASS, VTT, LRC subtitles. 50+ languages.

mdTranslator.description: Batch translate Markdown, preserving format and code

textSplitter.description: Smart long text splitter for AI and social media

jsonValueExtractor.description: Batch extract JSON fields with formatting

jsonNodeEdit.title: JSON Batch Edit
jsonNodeEdit.description: Batch edit JSON nodes with prefix/suffix/replace

jsonValueTransformer.title: JSON Value Mapper
jsonValueTransformer.description: Field value mapping and migration with JSONPath

jsonValueSwapper.title: JSON Value Swapper
jsonValueSwapper.description: One-click swap of two field values

jsonNodeInserter.title: JSON Node Inserter
jsonNodeInserter.description: Batch insert new nodes at specified position

jsonSortClassify.title: JSON Sort & Classify
jsonSortClassify.description: Sort and group arrays with custom rules

jsonMatchUpdate.description: Batch update data by matching fields

Metadata.title: ToolsByAI | Free Open Source AI Translation & Data Tools
Metadata.description: Looking for efficient dev tools? ToolsByAI offers 20+ free apps like Subtitle Translator & JSON Editor. Powered by DeepSeek & AI, secure & local. Start now!
Metadata.homeDescription: 20+ tools for translation, text, JSON, and data conversion. Boost efficiency for developers and creators.
Metadata.ogTitle: ToolsByAI | Free Open Source AI Translation & Data Tools
Metadata.ogDescription: Looking for efficient dev tools? ToolsByAI offers 20+ free apps like Subtitle Translator & JSON Editor. Powered by DeepSeek & AI, secure & local. Start now!

CopyToClipboard.unsupported: Browser does not support clipboard, please copy manually

feedback.feedback2: If you encounter issues or have suggestions, let me know! Your feedback drives future development and helps us build better tools for everyone.
feedback.feedback3: Please describe your use case, issue, or creative idea. I read every message and will respond/optimize as soon as possible.
feedback.placeholder: Leave a message (no login required, email optional for reply)
